#Text=CanadaVOTES : NDP candidate Anne Lagacé Dowson in Westmount — Ville-Marie
#Text=Friday , October 10 , 2008
#Text=In an attempt to speak with as many candidates as possible during the 2008 Canadian federal election , Wikinews has talked via email with Anne Lagacé Dowson .
#Text=Dowson is a candidate in Quebec 's Westmount — Ville-Marie riding , running under the New Democratic Party ( NDP ) banner .
#Text=There is no incumbent in Dowson 's riding , as the area 's Liberal MP resigned earlier this year .
#Text=A by-election was scheduled , but cancelled at the last minute , once Prime Minister Stephen Harper called a national election .

#Text=Candidates in the riding are Dowson ( NDP ) , former astronaut Marc Garneau ( Liberal ) , Charles Larivée ( Bloc Québécois ) , Guy Dufort ( Conservative ) , and co-deputy party leader for the Greens Claude William Genest .
#Text=Judith Vienneau of the joke party Neorhino . ca is also on the ballot .
#Text=The riding includes the City of Westmount , parts of Old Montreal , the Borough of Ville-Marie , Notre-Dame-de-Grâce , and The Plateau .
#Text=The following is an interview with Ms. Dowson , conducted via email .
#Text=The interview is published unedited , as sent to Wikinews .
#Text=Interview
#Text=Why are you running for political office , why at the federal level , why this party , and why in this riding ?
#Text=Incumbents :
#Text=Why did you choose to run for office , and why do you wish to continue as an MP ?
#Text=Anne decided it was time to take a more active role in doing something about the issues facing Montrealers .
#Text=She joined Jack Layton ’s team to help fight for better education and health care .
#Text=Anne wants Canada to return to its role as the world ’s greatest peacekeeper .
#Text=And she wants a return of civility to the House of Commons , so it ’s no longer a shouting reality show .
#Text=But the real tipping point that made Anne realize she had to do something more ?
#Text=When her 7 year-old daughter , Emma , asked her “ Mummy , what do we do when there are no fish left in the oceans ” ?
#Text=Previous to this campaign , have you been politically involved ?
#Text=How will you apply your
#Text=previous work/volunteer/life experience to serving your constituents ?
#Text=Anne has been a journalist on CBC and Radio-Canada for close to 20 years .
#Text=She hosted a call-in radio show for years .
#Text=Her strength will be to listen to her constituents ' concerns and be a strong voice
#Text=for those concerns in Ottawa .
#Text=As you campaign around your riding , it 's likely that some issues are mentioned more often by voters , than other issues .
#Text=What would you say are the three hottest topics this election , in your riding ?
#Text=What would you and your party do to address these issues ?
#Text=The environment is certainly a big concern for everyone .
#Text=The NDP 's cap-and-trade proposal to curb greenhouse gas emissions gets a great reception at the doorsteps .

#Text=People in Westmount -- Ville-Maire are really supportive of environmental initiatives like this , especially because it sets absolute limits to the emissions of big polluters and gives real incentives to produce environmentally friendly products .
#Text=Our riding is also a very demographically mixed one .
#Text=Fairly wealthy houses and extreme poverty ; English , French and New Canadians side by side .
#Text=Anne would definitely work on mediating some of the most blatant disparaties , for example , by extending the national homelessness partnership .
#Text=Finally , our riding is home to three large university campuses .
#Text=Having paid off her student debt over a lengthy period , Anne knows how difficult it is for students to make ends meet .
#Text=Anne will stand up for better grants , more affordable student loans and reinstating the full summer student employment programme .
#Text=There are more ways than ever to get your message out , from the traditional campaign fliers and lawn signs , to new media like websites , Facebook , and YouTube .
#Text=The tried-and-true routes get the message out to the masses much easier , but digital alternatives are much more measurable in how many are seeing or interacting with your campaign .
#Text=What seems to be the most effective , from your experience ?
#Text=Check out some of the videos on our website , www . annelagacedowson . ca
#Text=We 've really made an effort to use internet-based communications as much as we can .
#Text=We are also leading all other candidates in Westmount — Ville-Marie in Facebook friends .
#Text=Facebook has become a great events organising and mobilisation tool .
